posts.post_content:

Sharpe - Piedmont
Sharpe - (trimmed) Piedmont TRADED
Sharpe - (trimmed) Sweet Cap black
Downey -  Piedmont
Downey - (trimmed) Sweet Cap red

Murphy - Piedmont
